Title: Destiny and Fortune
Plot: Queen Anne is imprisoned in the Tower, awaiting her execution. The king granted her wish for a special executioner, but he is delayed and the execution has to be postponed. King Henry proposes to Jane Seymour now that his marriage to Anne has been declared null and void. He hopes she will gave him a legitimate, male heir.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,offensive language and sex scenes
GuestStars: Sarah Bolger (Mary Tudor), Stephen Brennan (John Seymour), Anita Briem (Jane Seymour), Jane Brennan (Lady Margaret Bryan), Rebekah Wainwright (Catherine), Max Brown (Edward Seymour), Anthony Brophy (Ambass
